holidays.title: National Dentist's Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the professionals who keep our chompers chomping, our gnashers gnashing, and our whites pearly.

holidays.title: National Dress Day
holidays.description: Pay homage to dresses and the magical moments that happen when we wear them.

holidays.title: National Frozen Food Day
holidays.description: Stock up your freezers to celebrate subzero sustenance on National Frozen Food Day.

holidays.title: National Oreo Cookie Day
holidays.description: With crisp chocolate cookies and creamy filling, these little cookies have captured hearts  — and our stomachs.

holidays.title: Purim
holidays.description: Jewish people all over the world celebrate the victorious festival of Purim.

holidays.title: Alamo Day
holidays.description: Join the celebration for the brave hundreds who gave their lives at the Alamo.

holidays.title: Casimir Pulaski Day
holidays.description: To make America great, several soldiers sacrificed their lives. One of them is Casimir Pulaski.

holidays.title: Day of Memorial And Respect For Veterans
holidays.description: Day of Memorial and Respect for Veterans is an event in Kosovo that honors all veterans.

holidays.title: Day of the Dude
holidays.description: Take a chill pill, and enjoy life’s simple moments on this holiday that’s all about relaxation.

holidays.title: Dentist Day
holidays.description: Let’s honor the professionals who work tirelessly to keep our teeth in the finest possible condition.

holidays.title: Fast of Esther
holidays.description: Fast of Esther is practiced as a way of developing willpower and gaining divine favor.

holidays.title: Fun Facts About Names Day
holidays.description: It’s a fun day to learn about the meaning, history, and importance of your name.

holidays.title: Ghana Independence Day
holidays.description: Ghanaians celebrate the heroes who led the way in the country’s struggle for independence.

holidays.title: Guam Discovery Day
holidays.description: Tune in to celebrate and honor the rich cultural heritage and history of Guam!

holidays.title: Guam History And Chamorro Heritage Day
holidays.description: Here’s everything you need to know about Guam and the Chamorro people. Read on for more.

holidays.title: Iraq Day Of Tolerance And Coexistence
holidays.description: Observe Iraq Day of Tolerance and Coexistence to promote religious tolerance in Iraq.

holidays.title: Makha Bucha
holidays.description: Makha Bucha is the celebration of the conception of an ideal community.

holidays.title: National Brian Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate all variants of the name Brian today right here on National Brian Day!

holidays.title: National Damien Day
holidays.description: Let’s honor and learn about the name Damien this National Damien Day.

holidays.title: National Ford Day
holidays.description: Indulge yourself further in knowing what the meaning behind your name is.

holidays.title: National Heroes and Benefactors Day
holidays.description: Let us honor those who have generously contributed their service and support to Belize.

holidays.title: National Report General Service Administration (GSA) Fraud Day
holidays.description: The day sensitizes the public to fraud committed against the G.S.A. government program.

holidays.title: National Shirley Day
holidays.description: Raise a Shirley Temple for the Shirleys of the world this National Shirley Day.

holidays.title: National White Chocolate Cheesecake Day
holidays.description: Who doesn’t love a rich, creamy cheesecake? No one. Absolutely no one.

holidays.title: No Homework Day
holidays.description: No homework, no problem! Move the books over and let’s try something new.

holidays.title: World Tennis Day
holidays.description: Learn the power of a good serve and watch the court come alive!

holidays.title: Biannca Prince’s Birthday
holidays.description: This couple owns five different YouTube channels. Each channel has millions of subscribers.

holidays.title: Harriet Tubman’s Birthday
holidays.description: Honoring  Harriet Tubman — the woman who showed extraordinary courage, ingenuity, persistence, and iron discipline

holidays.title: Jacob Bertrand’s Birthday
holidays.description: For talented actor Jacob Bertrand, karate is only just the beginning. Celebrate him today!

holidays.title: Shaquille O'Neal’s Birthday
holidays.description: Shaquille O'Neal is one of those basketball players who need little to no introduction.

holidays.title: Tyler The Creator’s Birthday
holidays.description: A Baudelaire that rose from nowhere and whose grim style evolved into a soulful expression!

holidays.title: Tyler1’s Birthday
holidays.description: From zero to hero — how a permanent ban catapulted this streamer’s career!
